verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> fallen <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> there was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of the <S%G5421>pit<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G5421>pit<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there went <S%G305>up<s%> a <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G5421>pit<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2575>furnace<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G109>air<s%> were <S%G4654>darkened<s%> by <S%G1537>reason<s%> of the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of the <S%G5421>pit<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> forth <S%G200>locusts<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4651>scorpions<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it was <S%G4483>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G91>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G91>hurt<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> green <S%G5515>thing<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%>, <S%G1487>but<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G3748>such<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> as <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3361>foreheads<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G615>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should be <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G929>torment<s%> was <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G929>torment<s%> of a <S%G4651>scorpion<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> it <S%G3817>striketh<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2212>shall<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>shall<s%> in <S%G3756>no<s%> wise <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2147>shall<s%> <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> fleeth <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3667>shapes<s%> of the <S%G200>locusts<s%> were like <S%G3664>unto<s%> <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G4735>crowns<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> unto <S%G5557>gold<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4383>faces<s%> were <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>'s <S%G4383>faces<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2359>hair<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2359>hair<s%> of <S%G1135>women<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3599>teeth<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> teeth of <S%G3023>lions<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%>, as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> of <S%G4603>iron<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%> was <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G716>chariots<s%>, of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G5143>rushing<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> unto <S%G4651>scorpions<s%>, and2532, 2258 <S%G2759>stings<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> is <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>.

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> as <S%G935>king<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss<s%>: his <S%G3686>name<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> is <S%G3>Abaddon<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the Greek <S%G1673>tongue<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G623>Apollyon<s%>.
The <S%G1520>first<s%> <S%G3759>Woe<s%> is <S%G565>past<s%>: <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3759>Woes<s%> <S%G5023>hereafter<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3391>a<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G5064>the<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> of the <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>,

one <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> one <S%G4536>trumpet<s%>, <S%G3089>Loose<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> are <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G2166>Euphrates<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G3089>loosed<s%>, <S%G3588>that<s%> had been <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3376>month<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G615>kill<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G4753>armies<s%> of the <S%G2461>horsemen<s%> was <S%G1417>twice<s%> ten <S%G3461>thousand<s%> times ten <S%G3461>thousand<s%>: <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3706>vision<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of <S%G4447>fire<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G5191>hyacinth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2306>brimstone<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the2776, 2462 <S%G2776>heads<s%> of <S%G3023>lions<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouths<s%> <S%G1607>proceedeth<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2303>brimstone<s%>.

By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> plagues was the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%>, <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G4442>fire<s%> and2532, 1537 the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>the<s%> <S%G2303>brimstone<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouths<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> of the horses <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> are like <S%G3664>unto<s%> <S%G3789>serpents<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> they <S%G91>hurt<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of <S%G444>mankind<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G615>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%>, <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G4352>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1140>demons<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1497>idols<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G693>silver<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G5470>brass<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3035>stone<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3585>wood<s%>; <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G991>see<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%>:

and <S%G3340>they<s%> repented <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5408>murders<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2532>sorceries<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2809>thefts<s%>.
